title: Will the black activated charcoal remove or delete the vaccine in you?
description: Answer (1 of 10): Will the black activated charcoal remove or delete the vaccine in you? Not in any way shape or form. You didn't ingest it. Besides, why in God's name would you WANT to remove it?
